title: [BUG] Token display mismatch: progress vs status line

logs.msg: Reviewed code - progress shows per-request tokens, status shows cumulative context. These are different metrics. Need specific repro to understand what mismatch is expected.

Root cause: Progress line accumulates input_tokens across all turns (+=), Status shows token_usage snapshot of context. In multi-turn tasks with tool calls, progress keeps growing while status shows current context. Consider: show same metric in both, or clarify labels.

Fixed: input_tokens now shows latest turn's context size instead of accumulating across turns. This matches the context % display better. Output tokens still accumulate (correct for streaming deltas).
